body_html:
I'll try when I get home from work, however that page show you can build GCC 6.3, I have GCC 7.2 installed. I saw some stuff yesterday that suggests that cuda is broken with GCC >6.x I'll see if I can dig it out later

EDIT: smi output to confirm the driver is installed properly.

+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+

|-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+

body:
I'll try when I get home from work, however that page show you can build GCC 6.3, I have GCC 7.2 installed. I saw some stuff yesterday that suggests that cuda is broken with GCC >6.x I'll see if I can dig it out later

EDIT: smi output to confirm the driver is installed properly.
```
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| NVIDIA-SMI 387.34                 Driver Version: 387.34                    |
|-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
| GPU  Name        Persistence-M| Bus-Id        Disp.A | Volatile Uncorr. ECC |
| Fan  Temp  Perf  Pwr:Usage/Cap|         Memory-Usage | GPU-Util  Compute M. |
|===============================+======================+======================|
|   0  GeForce GTX 960     Off  | 00000000:01:00.0  On |                  N/A |
|  0%   23C    P8     7W / 160W |    292MiB /  1993MiB |      0%      Default |
+-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
                                                                               
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Processes:                                                       GPU Memory |
|  GPU       PID   Type   Process name                             Usage      |
|=============================================================================|
|    0      1314      G   /usr/libexec/Xorg                             15MiB |
|    0      1492      G   /usr/bin/gnome-shell                          42MiB |
|    0      1935      G   /usr/libexec/Xorg                             76MiB |
|    0      2048      G   /usr/bin/gnome-shell                          78MiB |
|    0      2981      G   ...-token=49AE7F2C125E2F5D8E867A8E61CBEB05    71MiB |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
```
